title: C9 vs TL series proves why Curse will stay 4th forever.
body:
Congratulations to Cloud 9 for beating Liquid in BO5 after coming back from a 2 game deficit. 19-1 record against Curse chokers is impressive. Nobody should be surprised to see Liquid choking because they are all known for choking hazards. Had 2 game leads in playoffs and as always knows how to throw so hard.

Once again, as I mentioned before and I will say it again: $h*tlet is overrated trash. If the whole Liquid/Curse team would've put Keith in the game, I was sure that they were going to win but they didn't because they are all acting like hotheaded losers. Curse's stupidity is why that they will stay in 4th forever.

replies.body:
This has to be one of the most ridiculous analysts of professional League of Legends I have seen. Go back to bronze please and stay off the forums. C9's adaptation to the Best of 5 and TLs inability to adapt back is the cause.

Bringing out the Piglet/Keith argument AGAIN is completely asinine. You either did not watch the games or you did and everything going on went above your head. So I can only assume that you are either a troll or looking for some sort of infamy with this thread. Either of which should see you in put in Troll Prison. TL 3-0d CLG, 2-0d C9 then tilted from the 1 threat Jugger'maw comp not working. (Damn you C9 for taking Corki, and TL giving Quas Sion).

Fair-Weather fans such as you make me sick, please go fanboy for another team, TL doesn't want you as a fan. Hell, no professional organization wants someone like you as a fan. Overall, if you are going to bring up idiotic arguments and lack of substantial information. All you are doing is complaining and making yourself look bad.

maybe they'll beat tip/tsm

wait nvm 4Ever4th
